title: Fanfic: Dimension Chaos: updated april 23,2006: chapter3 up!
content:
Finally I'm getting around to typing up what I have of my story so far [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img]
To people who dont know what Dimension chaos is its a series of 4 fan fics thats a huge adventure staring Keen meeting up with characters from the Sonic the hedgehog series (and maybe in the future something more perhaps [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mischief.gif[/img] ). The story has a more epic feel to it though I will make sure there is humor also. I hope everyone will enjoy this new take on Keen and please read and review. (Only the short prologue is up but Chapter 1 will be up in a few days. I promise this time! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] )
Anyways heres the link:
[url=http://www.fanfiction.net/s/2600640/1/]www.fanfiction.net/s/2600640/1/[/url]
Enjoy
Chapter 1 here: [url=http://www.fanfiction.net/s/2600640/2/]www.fanfiction.net/s/2600640/2/[/url]
Chapter 2 here: [url=http://www.fanfiction.net/s/2600640/3/]www.fanfiction.net/s/2600640/3/[/url]
edit 3:
Chapter 3 is finally done and its another long one. anyways heres chapter 3 and enjoy. Also please read and review:
[url=http://www.fanfiction.net/s/2600640/4/]www.fanfiction.net/s/2600640/4/[/url] Check out my blog at [url=http://spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/]spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/[/url]
Check out my fanfics at [url=http://www.fanfiction.net/u/680124/]fanfiction.net[/url]

title: Re: Chapter 1 finally up!
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]I thought Keen had a younger sister?[hr][/quote]

Crap. Oh well can't get everything perfect can I [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img]
Thanks for the support so far guys. Theres gonna be some hell of some plot twists in this series coming up for Keen.
Anyways I've been working on chapter 2 lately so you'll be sure to see it up soon (hopefully this weekend if I'm not addicted to playing Shadow the hedgehog). Check out my blog at [url=http://spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/]spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/[/url]

title: Re: Chapter 1 finally up!
content:
That racist little game only reinfoces peoples negative stereotypes about africian americian hedgehogs everywhere! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-annoyed.gif[/img]:">

You have two options with the sister thing;

1.) Correct it retrospectively; alter your already written stuff to make her younger.

2.) Ignore it; after all, it is a fanfiction; why should you let a fact get in the way?

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Chapter 1 finally up!
content:
I'll keep it the way it is since I've already started writingt the fan fic of course and also the games themselves (if I'm not mistaken) doesn't mention a sister at all. Its only one of the song lyrics that mentions Keens sister. Check out my blog at [url=http://spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/]spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/[/url]

title: Re: Chapter 1 finally up!
content:
Hmm... I guess he's right about the song lirics... and I also think we made her younger because of how high her "Ha-Haha-Ha-Ha" is in "You got to eat your veggies".

Lets just says she's older, and was teasing Keen with a mock-brat attitude, because she's old enough to get away with not eating them (Her parents are having enough trouble keeping her from running away; why add to the chaos?)Proud Leader of the "Tough Guys Wear Pink" Society

title: Chapter 2 finally up!
content: Well, I like it, but it has same kind of problem that happens with many other fan fictions; things go way too fast! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Perhaps it's because of the fast Sonic characters.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] Places, characters, and events should be described more. I know it can be hard! LL's fan fiction is good example of the good style I'm talking about.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Chapter 2 finally up!
content:
Yeah I gotta definatly work on my description skills which hopefully english next semester could help me. Check out my blog at [url=http://spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/]spaces.msn.com/members/superadammario/[/url]
Check out my fanfics at [url=http://www.fanfiction.net/u/680124/]fanfiction.net[/url]

title: Re: Chapter 2 finally up!
content:
Keen stared at the weapon pointed at him. It was... well, a gun like object. He smiled, turned and walked away. "What do you think you're doing?" yelled the guard to his retreating back. There was a pause, and a scream. Keen looked out of the corner of his eye at the hunched form of the adjectivore lying astride the guard, sucking the desription from his lifele, his dea- his err, body.

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord
